thread.title: Injury casts doubt on Afridi's inclusion in PSL final
thread.title_full: Injury casts doubt on Afridi's inclusion in PSL final

title: Injury casts doubt on Afridi's inclusion in PSL final
text:
A severe injury to the hand while fielding at cover has cast doubts on Zalmi all-rounder Shahid Afridiâ€™s inclusion in the team for the Pakistan Super League Final against Quetta Gladiators on March 5. 
Afridi injured his right hand on Friday while attempting to catch a drive from Kieron Pollard off Hassan Ali at covers at a catchable height. 
According to sources, Afridi was immediately rushed for the first aid and received 12 stitches to his right hand. 
A photo showed Afridi with a heavily bandaged right-handed. 
There was no immediate official comment, but sources confirmed that after the injury, Afridi is unlikely for the final of PSL against Quetta Gladiators in Lahore on Sunday. More Stories From PSL
